channel.title: Compiler/Paths?
channel.description:
Alright, so I'm trying to use this 508 source,
I compiled but I'm getting this error?
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/v2y64j.png[/img]
I've tried messing around with the compiler for about ten minutes..
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My paths -
CLASSPATH - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%; Path - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;;%systemroot%\system32
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compiler -
[code] @echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/content/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/ge/*.java pause[/code]
I've tried 7.1.0_01 in my compiler it just said system couldn't find the path specified,
If you could help it'd be appreciated..

item.title: Compiler/Paths?
item.dc:creator: @Tylerd21 Tylerd21
item.description:
@Tylerd21 wrote:

Alright, so I’m trying to use this 508 source,

I compiled but I’m getting this error?

I’ve tried messing around with the compiler for about ten minutes…

My paths -

CLASSPATH - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Path - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;;%systemroot%\system32

Compiler -

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/content/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/ge/*.java pause

I’ve tried 7.1.0_01 in my compiler it just said system couldn’t find the path specified,

If you could help it’d be appreciated…
